abstract: Apple expands it retail strategy onto the mobile phone.
snippet: Apple expands it retail strategy onto the mobile phone.
lead_paragraph: 10:17 a.m. | Updated Removed the reference to the app as Apple’s second application. The company has created a few other apps.

headline.main: An Apple App to Buy an Apple Phone

abstract: People aiming to reserve an iPhone 4 are having trouble placing orders on the Web sites of Apple and AT&T.
snippet: People aiming to reserve an iPhone 4 are having trouble placing orders on the Web sites of Apple and AT&T.
lead_paragraph: 11:07 a.m. | Updated  Added details on the current status of preorders on AT&T and Apple Web sites. Also included a response from AT&T addressing reports that some users were able to see the account information of strangers.

headline.main: IPhone 4 Orders Swamp AT&T and Apple Sites
